requirements.description: The system MUST implement OAuth 2.1 authorization code flow with PKCE
The system MUST validate JWT tokens using JWKs from IdP
The system MUST implement token refresh with rotation
The system MUST reject tokens with invalid signatures or alg=none
The system MUST validate nonce to prevent replay attacks
The system MUST handle clock skew of ±60 seconds
The system MUST validate aud, iss, exp, and nbf claims
The system MUST implement secure state parameter handling
The system SHOULD support multiple IdP configurations
The system SHOULD implement token introspection endpoint

requirements.description: The system MUST implement Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
The system MUST implement Attribute-Based Access Control (ABAC)
The system MUST support policy inheritance and composition
The system MUST evaluate policies in constant time
The system MUST support dynamic policy updates without restart
The system MUST provide audit logs for all authorization decisions
The system MUST support delegation of permissions
The system MUST implement policy conflict resolution
The system SHOULD support time-based policies
The system MAY support machine learning for anomaly detection

structured.content:
The system MUST implement Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)

The system MUST implement Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
The system MUST implement Attribute-Based Access Control (ABAC)
The system MUST support policy inheritance and composition
The system MUST evaluate policies in constant time
The system MUST support dynamic policy updates without restart
The system MUST provide audit logs for all authorization decisions
The system MUST support delegation of permissions
The system MUST implement policy conflict resolution
The system SHOULD support time-based policies
The system MAY support machine learning for anomaly detection

requirements.description: The platform MUST implement a blockchain with Proof of Stake consensus
The platform MUST support smart contracts with a Turing-complete VM
The platform MUST provide EVM-compatible bytecode execution
The platform MUST implement account state management with Merkle Patricia Tries
The platform MUST support transaction validation and gas metering
The platform MUST provide JSON-RPC API (eth_* methods)
The platform MUST support contract deployment and interaction
The platform MUST implement event logging and filtering
The platform SHOULD support WebSocket subscriptions for real-time events
The platform SHOULD implement cross-shard communication
The platform MAY support zero-knowledge proof verification

The system MUST execute jobs based on DAG dependencies

The system MUST run independent jobs in parallel
The system MUST detect and prevent circular dependencies
The system MUST support job retry with exponential backoff

The system SHOULD provide job execution history
